text:
I have always wanted to be a journalist. Arrived in class of 3eme we have to choose a company or place to do one week with them and so discover their job, how is the working life...So I have chosen to do mine in a journal redaction. Journalism already interests me but thanks to this experience I succeeded in having a more clear idea of what is to be a journalist. Moreover, my dad's bestfriend is a journalist, so we talked few times about his job and how to be a journalist and succedeed in it. He helped me to make good choices and thanks to him I knew more about the conditions of working, of life, some things that we never know before working in our job. He helped me also by guiding me in my studies. He was an exemple because he had succeeded in the objective I gave me.
At home we are always talking. My parents are interested in everything, sciences, philosophy, music, politics...So we have a lot of debates. Thanks to them I think I have a good general culture and they give me the curiosity of knowing more and more things always. It's when we watched the television to stay informed that we had these debates and so I was also knowing what was happening in the world.
In highshcool, I had to choose my specialities. I had already my objective, became a journalist, and also the school i wanted. So it was an easy choice for me. I choose HGGSP and it's was my favorite subject. I didn't expect it but this subject passionated me. Understand the stakes in the world, learn more preciselly about events that we have already study but under differents aspects, point of views... The fact that I loved this subject confirmed my wish of being journalist and let me to precise my objective.
Indeed the period of parcoursup arrived and I already kwew that I wanted this or this school, it was easy for me. Some schools ask me to be really precise on my wish and thanks to the people I have met, the things I known by myself and things that I learnd in school, I was able to answer their questions.
It's not really people that gave me the want of being and doing what I do but more experiences, meeting, determination and the wish that never leaved me.
